name: VivoActive Video File
summary: Learn about .VIVO files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Vivo Software developed the VIVO format to deliver compressed video over slow Internet connections. The technology enabled streaming content on dial-up networks, a common issue in the 1990s.

In 1997, RealNetworks acquired Vivo Software, and integrated some of its streaming technologies into RealPlayer. After the acquisition, RealNetworks discontinued the VIVO format, and newer streaming formats like RealVideo and other modern codecs replaced it.

description: A VIVO file is a video file associated with VivoActive, an early, now-discontinued streaming media technology used in the 1990s. It contains H.263-compressed video data and G.723 ADPCM-compressed audio data in the VivoActive (VIVO) format. VIVO files may store various types of video but most often contain adult video content.

instructions: You can open VIVO files with RealNetworks RealPlayer with the Vivo plugin.
